entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 07 January 2023
